meta.label: From Dataset - get US census block_id from lat lon
meta.author: Dataiku (Nicolas GAKRELIDZ)
meta.description: From Latitude, Longitude the API returns the block_id and derivated fields. At each batch, the plugin performs a groupby for removing duplicated Lat/Lon

params.name: p_col_lat
params.label: Column LATITUDE:
params.description: Column corresponding to LATITUDE in your input dataset

params.name: p_col_lon
params.label: Column LONGITUDE:
params.description: Column corresponding to LONGITUDE in your input dataset

params.name: param_api_throttle
params.label: API call throttle:
params.description: Define the pause in seconds between each API call
